solution_line_template: If the art piece was bought at ${purchase_price}, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth {multiplier_in_3_years}*${purchase_price} = ${future_price} in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by ${future_price}-${purchase_price} = $<<{future_price}-{purchase_price}={increase}>>{increase}
